name: Almy - Mouse War
description:
Almy is a simple funning shooting game.
Shoot the mice but remember to DODGE the ball which he is gonna throw it back to you. BUT, the problem isn't that life is unfair as the mice has obstacles to prevent your ball.

※ HOW TO PLAY

TOUCH the screen on left or right of the Almy to move.
PRESS"red circle button" to shoot the ball when you are ready.
DODGE the ball which the mice throws it back to you.

※ FREE-TO-PLAY
Almy is totaly Free-to-play

Go head-to-head and show off your skills as the ultimate player against your friends.
